text:
## How to check the task status for learners?

Emily is a trainer in an organisation and the Session 3 for "Class A" in the
course "Certified Quality Engineer" has been assigned to her. The learners
have tasks in this session, including the reference material task
"Classification of Quality Characteristics" and the file submission task
"Quality Control Practice". These tasks don’t require marking, and Emily needs
to check learners’ submission and completion status. The close time of the
tasks is coming. Emily can check the submission and completion status of the
tasks.

Let’s see how Emily will check the task status in Curricula.

#### View learners’ completion status of reference material tasks

1\. In Curricula, Emily clicks **Result** on the left navigation pane, and
then clicks **Tasks**.

2\. She finds the reference material task "Classification of Quality
Characteristics" for "Class A" and clicks **View details**.

3\. The reference material is a training video. In the **Learner’s completion
status** section, Emily can view each learner’s completion status, completed
time, and total spent time.

#### View learners’ submission status of file submission tasks

1\. Emily clicks **Result** on the left navigation pane, and then clicks
**Tasks**.

2\. She finds the non-gradable file submission task “Quality Control Practice”
for "Class A" and clicks **View details**.

3\. In the **Learner’s submissions** section, Emily can view each learner’s
submission status and submitted time.

4\. She locates the task of a learner who has submitted and clicks **View
details**.

5\. On the **View response details****** page, she can check the learner’s
submission details, and then clicks **Next learner** to check the submission
details of the next learner.

The file submission task is now overdue and some learners haven’t submitted
their tasks. What if Emily wants to extend deadline for them? Let’s see how
Emily will extend deadline.

#### Extend deadline for learners

1\. In the **Learner’s submissions** section, Emily can see each learner’s
deadline.

• If Emily wants to extend deadline to the same date for all learners who
haven’t submitted their file submissions, she clicks **Extend deadline** and
selects **Extend deadline for all learners**.

• If Emily wants to extend different learners’ deadline to different dates,
she selects one or more learners, clicks **Extend deadline** , and then
selects **Extend deadline for the selected learners**.

2\. In the **Extend deadline** window, she selects a new deadline for the
learners.
